answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!Restrict protein intake. Test once for diabetes and for kidney function. If all are normal, repeat the medications you took earlier. Do not avoid proteins but keep a watch on the amount you take.It is difficult to comment beyond this at this stage.  Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: Hi, i have developed some red rashes in my skin.I had the same problem 3 years back and doctors diagonised it as excess proteins in body, i had medications and it dissappeared.Now ,after 3 yrs again i have noticed the eruption of red mounts kind of rashes.I had a baby boy 3 months back after which i was prescibed some protein drinks and calcium virtamin tablets , all of which i had.Recent urine \test showed albumin trace in my urine .Hence, can the rashes be the result of the same.What do i need to do now.
title: skin rash
